p: In addition to the considerable rate of penicillin resistance, it is valuable to mention the high incidence of strains resistant to oxacillin ( n = 22; 78.6%) (Table 1). Oxacillin resistance is associated of the mecA gene, which encodes a protein with low binding affinity to β-lactam. Thus, in vitro resistance to oxacillin indicated resistance to all other β-lactam drugs [ 26, 27].
